executable.title: Mesh To Label Map
executable.description: This module converts a 3D model into a label map
executable.acknowledgements: This work was funded by National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIDCR) and the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering (NIBIB) through the Grant R01 DE024450

geometry.name: mesh
geometry.label: Input Mesh
geometry.description: Input mesh to convert into a label map

image.name: reference
image.label: Reference Image
image.description: Reference image: used to set the output image size, orientation, spacing and dimensions

integer.name: value
integer.label: Pixel Value
integer.description: Label map pixel value (needs to be an integer between 1 and 255 included)

double-vector.name: spacingVec
double-vector.label: Spacing
double-vector.description: Output label map volume spacing (in mm)

double-vector.name: boundaryExtension
double-vector.label: Boundary Extension
double-vector.description: Extension (in number of voxel) of the boundary box computed from the input mesh

boolean.name: smoothing
boolean.label: Apply smoothing
boolean.description: Select if a median image filter smoothing is applied to the output label map

double-vector.name: smoothingRadius
double-vector.label: Smoothing kernel radius
double-vector.description: Radius (in number of voxel) of the kernel of the median smoothing

boolean.name: verbose
boolean.label: Verbose
boolean.description: Print information while tool in running
